DOC.brief_summary: In study , investigator ask question : incentivizing small , less costly behaviors—like get dress go gym—be effective ( palatable ) incentivizing large goal directly ?
DOC.brief_title: Dress Success : Can Just Dressing Gym Help Going Gym ?
DOC.detailed_description: To test hypothesis , investigator randomly assign participant one three experimental condition : ( 1 ) control , ( 2 ) dress success ( low effort ) , ( 2 ) exercise success ( high effort ) . The investigator ' hypothesis incentivizing low effort , indirect/workout-related behavior ( i.e. , `` dress success '' ) effective motivating workout control , despite lack economic incentive workout . Additionally , investigator compare workout level group 2 3 ; difference two group ( 2 high exercise rate 3 ) , would suggest indirect incentive may effective direct one .
DOC.criteria: optin recruitment email investigator ' corporate partner 's user .
